name: Forest
description: The forest, where all normal people do their normal things.

name: Bear Cave
description: A small cave in the forest. A brave farmer could potentially walk out of it with most his limbs ingested.

name: Spider Nest
description: A huge nest of horror, for cowards anyway.

name: Wolf Den
description: A dark cave filled with fangs, ready to be pulled.

name: Abbandoned village
description: A village abbandoned by the forest
